# awesome-openrouter

> Awesome list of apps that work with OpenRouter. OpenRouter provides access to 300+ AI Models through a single API.

## Overview

awesome-openrouter is an open-source project by nirholas. Awesome list of apps that work with OpenRouter. OpenRouter provides access to 300+ AI Models through a single API.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/awesome-openrouter
- Language: JavaScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
